#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

long find(long n)
{
	long r=0,sum=n,x=n;
	while(x)
	{
		r=x%10;
		sum=sum+r;
		x=x/10;
	}
	
	
	return (sum);
	
};


int main()
{
	long t,num,x,n,l=0,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t-->0)
	{

		cin>>num;
		x=num;
		while(x)
		{
			l++;
			x=x/10;
		}

		 n=0;
		
		n=num-(l*9);

		for(i=n;i<num;++i)
		{

			if(find(i)==num)
			{
				cout<<i<<'\n';
				break;
			}
			
		}
		if(i==num)
			cout<<"NONE\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
